headline: Materials Dividends Spotlight: Linde’s (LIN) Consistent Payout and Global Reach
summary: Linde plc (NASDAQ:LIN) is included among the 13 Best Materials Dividend Stocks to Buy Right Now. Linde plc (NASDAQ:LIN) holds the position as the leading industrial gas company globally, providing a wide variety of gases used across multiple industries.
